mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(entityId, loginName, loginPassword, nickName, createDate) values (#{entityId}, #{loginName}, #{loginPassword}, #{nickName}, #{createDate})
mapper.select: select entityId, loginName, loginPassword, nickName, createDate from tbl_user order by create_date desc limit #{limit}, #{offset}
select entityId, loginName, loginPassword, nickName, createDate from tbl_user where entityId = #{entityId}
